cause.description:
For a dollar a day support a poor literate, heavy brown accent immigrant learn proper pronunciation skills...so people will not diss them by the way they sound and speak english...
1. Browness accent must be destoryed when speakin english
2. If u wanna keep ur accent...have a switch so u can turn it on and off when u are speaking hindi or english
cause.mission: Teach every brown immigrant to speak proper english so they will not get laughed at
cause.name: We are Hindus...and dont like our accents
